bounties.title: Better error response for wrong datetime format in REST filter
Per-collection metrics for Prometheus
Database dumps do not work on large databases
Replicate data from external source to internal source with a Plugin
Split Mudlet up into `libmudlet` and a Qt front-end
generic mapper: add video walkthrough on how to set it up
Support telnet:// links
Autocomplete steals window focus, prevents further typing
[Enhancement]: Don't timeout public database proxies after 10 min
[Enhancement]: Environment variables for each server that are auto-added to each application deployed on it
[Bug]: Sporadic Permission denied (publickey,password).
[Enhancement]: Add surrealDB with and without TIKV
[Enhancement]: new deployment page
[Enhancement]: Enable backup restore/import for ServiceDatabase (Docker Compose databases)
[Enhancement]: Enable database detection and backup support for Docker Compose deployments via GitHub App
[Bug]: Database Backups won't use the custom timeout in ssh command (regression)
[Bug + Multiple Bounties]: Official Selfhosted Supabase MCP Setup hindered by Coolify AND Bounty List
[Enhancement]: Use pgBackRest for Postgres backups
